text: - [Narrator] Secure communication
is essential for business success.

Employees routinely use
consumer messaging applications
at home and at work.
While these apps are convenient,
they often lack the robust security
and administrative controls
many organizations require.
AWS Wickr is a security first messaging

and collaboration service
with features designed
to help keep your communication secure,
private, and compliant.
One-to-one and group messaging,

voice and video calling,
file sharing, screen sharing,
and location sharing are protected
with 256 bit end-to-end encryption.
No one except your intended recipient

has the keys required
to decrypt the content,

giving you complete
control over your data.

Cloud native and self-hosted
options are available.

Flexible controls allow
your administrators
to add, remove, and invite users,
and organize them into security groups.

Additionally, information can
be retained in a private store
that you control,
helping you meet compliance requirements.
Start using your AWS Management Console
to create a managed, secure AWS Wickr

Communication and
Collaboration Network today.
